attributes.action: Support the Establishment of the most Steadfast Order of the Red Squirrel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We Call to Promote the Good Name of
the Native British Red Squirrel the
most Steadfast Order of the Red Squirrel
as a Reward for Efforts in Promoting 
and Conserving this Fine Creature and
to signify Official Recognition of the
Red Squirrel as part of British Wildlife

There should be Awards for Preserving
British Wildlife and Instituting Awards
named after Creatures is a Rightful Step
